column1: Little Goat Diner////I'm pretty sure I could eat anything off of this menu and think I died and went to heaven. Then
column3: and be in the presence of such great music (often old school hip hop)
column4: makes me want to eat every meal here. The kicker? The place has a great design. I always feel like I'm somewhere fancy
column6: if that makes sense. I feel like that's a rarity. I love you
